channel.title: Recent Duping
channel.description:
There was a recent Duping (not sure, found plenty of people in tip.it claiming they duped). People said it was a recent roll back (looked convincing as there was plenty of other people complaining they lost levels).
Did anyone experience this? why doesnt anything ever happen to me on rs :(
Also maybe theres a way to exploit this :D

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @saltnpepper saltnpepper
item.description:
@saltnpepper wrote:

wierd… shhhh…if you can keep it a secret…i’m pretty sure if you managed to exploit it, and everyone starts doing it, jagex will eventually work out a way to stop it… kinda like every other glitch that hppened before in rs history.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @armanie14 armanie14
item.description:
@armanie14 wrote:

W[quote=“ro0n scap3, post:17, topic:2215”]omg ppl jagex has posted a while back on updates

“in the hours between 12:00 am and 12:04 am, we reset our jave motor for the new day, doing so will lose what your player has done in the last 15 minutes or so”[/quote]

WHAT!?

Was that a direct quote from jagex?

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

There’s also a change that the rollback happens to the other account and not to you, so the items will be completely lost. Better not trade anything when there’s a system update.
[/quote]

Unless you trade between your own chars

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

theghost14:

i sold 8k iron and next thing u know i got other 8k iron when i logged bak on my autoer

Ye but it could’ve been the server crashesing and starting up with a backup file becuase that happend to me once… and if it wasnt that and u still had the coal did u still have the money?

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @daiki daiki
item.description:
@daiki wrote:

[quote=“Everyonedies, post:11, topic:2215”]You cant dupe anymore and you could only dupe once.[/quote]You can dupe by accident whenever there’s a server rollback :). There’s also a change that the rollback happens to the other account and not to you, so the items will be completely lost. Better not trade anything when there’s a system update.

It must have been over half a year since my account rollbacked after an update. I lost all my runes I bought from mage guild but got my money back.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

You cant dupe anymore and you could only dupe once.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

no it was a 1 time thing where they accidently messed up on something and had to take off their last 10mins of work or else rs would be messed up

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

[quote=“eLMafUDd, post:7, topic:2215”]I alerted some people of this quite a while ago. I’m not sure if it happened the same way, but I only duped 2.5k

One update (I’m not sure if it is all) all the players that were logged in during the update were rolled back 10 minutes or so, and the people who logged out were fine. I had readed 2.5k to my aryan autoer to buy a decent pick and then i bought the pick on my aryan autoer and logged out and kept playing with my legit. Next thing I know, Theres an update and when i log back in im back at the bank with 2.5k and my miner is still in the mines with the picks.

I posted it on sythe a while back and never thought anything much else of it.[/quote]

Next update im gonna try that. But i doubt it would work. People merchanting 10 mins before the system update would end up 2x richer?

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Duping
item.dc:creator: @eLMafUDd eLMafUDd
item.description:
@eLMafUDd wrote:

I alerted some people of this quite a while ago. I’m not sure if it happened the same way, but I only duped 2.5k

One update (I’m not sure if it is all) all the players that were logged in during the update were rolled back 10 minutes or so, and the people who logged out were fine. I had readed 2.5k to my aryan autoer to buy a decent pick and then i bought the pick on my aryan autoer and logged out and kept playing with my legit. Next thing I know, Theres an update and when i log back in im back at the bank with 2.5k and my miner is still in the mines with the picks.

I posted it on sythe a while back and never thought anything much else of it.

Read full topic
